ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 543
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh no kidding. I know some kids that beg me for uber gear that is better than what I have. Or ask for money or PLs and stuff. Nice kids and all, but I want to
ygData.messageBody:
Oh no kidding. I know some kids that beg me for uber gear that is better
than what I have. Or ask for money or PLs and stuff. Nice kids and all, but
I want to tell them to cut it out bc I'd like to get myself some stuff
before I go getting for others. Heh.
luv,
-Su


> I played with one family on Solusek Ro
> 3 generations played
> grandma in her 50s
> parents in their 30s
> youngest was a 10 year old girl and she rocked
> her brothers though, they were a bunch of begging pains in
> the butt!!!!
>
>
> --- Su <suceress@...> wrote:
> > Yeah, it is amazing the range of ages of players. I've
> > seen as young as 7
> > and as old as 75 playing. My mom plays and she's 52.
> > luv,
> > -Su
> >
> > > If you don't mind me asking, How old are you two? The
> > reason I ask is I
> > > would be curious as to what some of the ages people are
> > who play. Since
> > > you mentioned your "retired" that really got me to
> > wondering. ;-)
> > >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > Message: 6
> > > Date: Sun, 28 Jul 2002 11:13:58 -0500
> > > From: "Orion" <orionv@...>
> > > Subject: Re: Re: bazaar
> > >
> > > My wife and I are both retired and play a lot. We have
> > no life so that
> > > makes it even easier....:> Hey it keeps us out of
> > trouble..hehehe
> > >
> > >
